1.post_text: We hear you on the prices of our McChicken and Double Cheeseburger.  The two sandwiches were previously priced $2 as part of our Daily Savers promotion launched back in 2005. We kept this consistent over the years despite rising costs of raw materials and ingredients. For our Daily Savers fans, we are sorry that this promotion is no longer available as we do change and introduce new promotions over time. For example we now have the McChicken and Double Cheeseburger Extra Value Meals priced at $4.50 not only during lunch hours but actually throughout the day. We continue to listen to improve our value to you and you can email us at  ops@sg.mcd.com.

== McDonald's Singapore - "A La Carte" TIPS TO SAVE $ ==

TIP1: Don't buy McWings 4pc at $4.40. Buy two boxes of the promotional McWings 2pc at $2. You pay $4 and save 40 cents. It's EXACTLY the same food!

TIP2: Don't buy McNuggets 6pc at $3.95. Buy two boxes of the promotional McNuggets 4pc at $2. You pay $4 for 8pc! And you get the extra 2 pc for just 5 cents! (worth $1.31)

TIP3: Don't buy McNuggets 9pc at $5.40 (60c per nugget). Buy two or three boxes of promotional McNuggets 4pc at $2 (50c per nugget). You pay either $4 (two box, save 80 cents) or $6 (three box, save $1.20).

TIP4: Don't buy Double Cheeseburger at $3.40. Buy two Cheeseburgers at $1.50. You pay $3 and save 40 cents, PLUS you get extra bun and extra sauce/pickles/etc (can ask for 'plain' if you don't want the sauce/pickles/etc).

== Feel free to copy and pass around! ==

It's not surprising that people would complain about the increase in the price of Double Cheeseburgers and McChicken but neglect the fact that all the prices of the set meals are cut. Meaning your 'beloved' McValue Lunch is extended to the whole day except for the breakfast hours so you can save much more on a whole meal rather than one measly burger. But of course people will forget that latter fact and instead pick faults on the increased prices of Double CheeseBurgers and McChicken. If McDonalds doesn't do that, they gonna run on a loss because the prices of a lot of things are already cut. Even now, the crew meals are cut from 6.50 to 5. And in our crew meals, we can't really get a set meal. We have to buy them ala carte, orignal price. Think about i

the fact is that this is a very well hidden price-increase attempt... yes, the prices are lower beyond 3pm, but to those who only used to eat mac between 12-3pm, it's a price increase of at least $0.50 to $1 or more...

18.post_text: Leaving a colourful mark on the wall were the happy staff of McDonald’s Singapore when they visited MINDS (Movement for the Intellectually Disabled of Singapore)schools as part of the McDonald’s Cares programme. Highlights of the visit included games that helped entertain the children and aid cognitive learning, as well as an appearance from Ronald McDonald that had all the kids up and dancing!
